Articles.Content:
I was wondering if it would be possible using a ModuleManager patch to forbid KSP from creating any kind of contract around a planet.

I know it's possible doing it for ISRU contracts using something like this:


@Contracts
{
    @ISRU
    {
        @RESOURCE_REQUEST[Ore]
        {
            Forbidden = PlanetName
        }
    }
}

but would it be possible doing it for all the different contracts?

I mean, no contracts at all, not even recover stuff in orbit around the planet.

thanks for the help

PS: I wasn't sure in which forum to post this question so I ended up posting it here
